---
title: "Edit Connection"
description: "Edit Connection edits a connection in the Embedded Cloud product."
api: POST https://cloud.cdata.com/api/poweredby/connection/edit/{connectionId}
contentType: application/json
---

Returns a string containing the URL to redirect the user to.

### Path Parameters

<ParamField path="connectionId" type="string" required>
The connection Id created in [Create Connection](#create-connection).
</ParamField>

### Payload Parameters

<ParamField path="redirectURL" type="string" required>
The URL to redirect the customer once the customer has edited the connection through the Connect AI UI.
</ParamField>

## Responses

### 200

A string containing the URL to redirect the user to.

`HTTP 200 OK`

<Expandable title="Response body">

<ResponseField name="redirectURL" type="string" required>
A string containing the URL to redirect the user to.
</ResponseField>

</Expandable>

<ResponseExample>

```json 200
{  
   "redirectURL": "https://cloud.cdata.com/oem/user/connections/edit/eeef6211-5d6f-4347-b5bb-f99d574e75e5?driver=MailChimp&token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IlNJdTlCdjVjWU1HMDRMYW84YXh3T0E2Nlk5UVlBV0dQd05YeTA5Q1hlY3MiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..JHkjo7tMBrwfoYRrPLUMXoW08Na6CU4EeZS374qvoaO5VGcUef5yyCssC49ca6lIH6DDXgb0a039XPPfIvj9ezqeeVPAt1iJo2TahUTilWwnNeFpkJ8Nh12X29yquzrWJFUYPhDdCKgHpaV0yPqHTZ0V5k8DoDIcTWFtA5xExo9_alpAmfYeIggtu_6pmlRbRWJHRpTWvSiadAzwWeDdMyGlwPjuDE06GjTIByelbH2fpYehlGedh7rganCxNLyjhtuKWlv7VqCQh2S6NOpAXFRgl6Fqy6byp9oIhyb3HeuWptvTig_YClN4_EP0Moq1lHV2v2LE-PBj6ixPoI0i-w&redirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com"
}
```

</ResponseExample>
